QuestData.Title: Brother Against Brother
QuestData.Description: The Sethekk departed Skettis when Auchindoun exploded.$B$BMy brother, Syth, was one of their leaders and told us we had to go into the ruins and face our god.$B$BIn time, Syth had me cast out of the Halls for doubting them, but he refused to let me take our sister Lakka. Will you help me rescue her?
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Lakka from captivity. Return to Isfar inside the Sethekk Halls when you've completed the rescue.
QuestData.RewardText: Knowing that Lakka is free means I can cut the rest of my ties to the Sethekk.$B$BPart of me will never forgive myself for Syth's death, but it had to be done. When I reach Skettis, I will perform the death rites for him.
